hero.title: Create online courses from your videos with AI
hero.subtitle: Upload videos and AI generates courses, quizzes, transcriptions, and descriptions automatically. White-label platform for creators and businesses.

problem.title: Creating an online academy is hard... or was

time.title: Weeks configuring platforms
time.description: Setting up your LMS, designing pages, configuring payments. Time you could spend creating content.

content.title: Hours writing descriptions
content.description: Every course needs titles, descriptions, objectives. Repetitive manual work.

quizzes.title: Days creating quizzes
quizzes.description: Thinking of questions, writing options, marking correct answers. Exhausting.

solution.title: With LearnBase, AI does the heavy lifting
solution.description: Upload your videos and documents. Our AI generates everything: transcriptions, descriptions, quizzes, and complete courses. You focus on what matters: teaching.

howItWorks.title: This is how the magic works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to launch your academy

upload.title: Upload your content
upload.description: Videos, documents, presentations. Any format. Our platform processes it all automatically.

generate.title: AI generates everything
generate.description: Automatic transcriptions, optimized titles, detailed descriptions, and quizzes based on your content.

launch.title: Customize and launch
launch.description: Adjust details, set your pricing, customize your brand and publish. Your academy ready in minutes.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of creators and businesses trust LearnBase

maria.name: Maria Garcia
maria.quote: LearnBase completely transformed our internal training. The AI agent answers employee questions 24/7.

carlos.name: Carlos Rodriguez
carlos.quote: I saved 50+ hours per course. The AI generates everything and I just review. Incredible.

ana.name: Ana Martinez
ana.quote: I migrated my academy from another platform in a week. The support was exceptional.

waitlist.title: Early access
waitlist.subtitle: Be among the first to try LearnBase
waitlist.form_description: We'll notify you when we launch. Early birds get an exclusive discount.
waitlist.success_message: We'll notify you when we launch.

ai.question: How does the AI work?
ai.answer: Upload a video and our AI analyzes it. It extracts audio, transcribes it, identifies main topics, and generates title, description, and quiz questions. All automatic.

domain.question: Can I use my own domain?
domain.answer: Yes. Connect your domain and your academy looks 100% yours.

data.question: Is my data secure?
data.answer: Your data is yours. We don't share it with third parties or use it to train models.

pricing.question: How much will it cost?
pricing.answer: We're finalizing pricing. Join the waitlist and we'll notify you with an exclusive launch discount.

finalCta.title: Your academy is one click away
finalCta.subtitle: Join thousands of creators already transforming knowledge into impact
finalCta.guarantee: No credit card required, no commitment

features.title: What LearnBase does for you
features.subtitle: We automate the tedious part. You focus on teaching.

ai.label: AI
ai.title: AI that understands your content
ai.description: Upload a video and AI generates transcription, title, description, and quiz questions automatically.

courses.label: Content
courses.title: Organized modules and lessons
courses.description: Structure your content in modules. Drag and drop to reorder. Publish when ready.

customization.label: Branding
customization.title: Your brand everywhere
customization.description: Custom domain, logo, colors, and typography. Your academy looks 100% yours.

enterprise.label: Business
enterprise.title: Ready for teams
enterprise.description: Manage instructors, assign courses, and track your team's progress.

aiSection.title: Your AI assistant that knows your students
aiSection.description: Create a personalized agent that understands your content, knows each student's progress, and can connect directly with WhatsApp to provide automated support.

knowledge.title: Knows your content
knowledge.description: The agent learns from your courses, materials, and documents to give accurate answers.

personality.title: Unique personality
personality.description: Configure how your agent speaks: tone, style, and personality that reflects your brand.

instant.title: Instant responses
instant.description: Available 24/7 to answer your students' questions in real time.

chat.title: Learnbase Assistant
chat.userMessage1: Hi, I have a question about module 3
chat.botMessage1: Sure, I'd be happy to help. Module 3 covers React fundamentals. What specific part are you confused about?
chat.botMessage2: Hooks are functions that let you use state and other React features. useState is the most basic one for managing local state.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your needs. All include a 14-day free trial.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of creators and businesses trust Learnbase for their online academies.

items.content: Learnbase completely transformed our internal training. The AI agent answers employee questions 24/7.
items.author: Maria Garcia

items.content: The WhatsApp integration was a game-changer. My students get reminders and can ask questions without leaving the app.
items.author: Carlos Rodriguez

items.content: I migrated my academy from another platform in a week. The support was exceptional and my students' experience improved significantly.
items.author: Ana Martinez

items.content: As a company, we needed a scalable solution. Learnbase allows us to manage over 5,000 employees without issues.
items.author: David Lopez

items.content: The brand customization is incredible. My academy looks exactly how I imagined it, with my domain and colors.
items.author: Laura Sanchez

items.content: The AI agent knows all my content. It's like having an assistant that never sleeps and always has the right answer.
items.author: Pedro Fernandez

domain.title: Custom Domain
domain.description: Configure a custom domain for your campus
domain.inputHelp: Domain only, without https:// or www (e.g., learn.yourcompany.com)
domain.configureInProvider: Add the following DNS record in your domain provider:
domain.hostNote: In your DNS provider, enter only the subdomain as the host (e.g., for "learn.company.com" enter "learn"). For root domains (e.g., "company.com"), enter "@" as the host.
domain.propagationNote: DNS changes can take up to 24-48 hours to propagate
